hero.title: Improve Learning Through Conversations
hero.description: Provide your students with personalized one-on-one learning support through voice dialogues with AI in their native language.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.paragraph1: Millions of learners worldwide study core subjects like Science and Mathematics in English, even when English isn't their native language. This creates a dual challenge: students must simultaneously develop English proficiency and master complex academic concepts.
challenge.paragraph2: Traditional assessments often fail to distinguish between language limitations and conceptual gaps, leading to learning loss and forcing students to rely on rote memorization rather than true understanding.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.subtitle: Voice-first AI learning support that bridges language barriers

voiceDialogue.title: Voice-Based Dialogue
voiceDialogue.description: Students explain concepts and respond to questions in their native or most comfortable language, reducing cognitive load and enabling deeper thinking.

englishScaffolding.title: Progressive English Scaffolding
englishScaffolding.description: English terms and expressions are gradually introduced through meaningful, context-grounded interactions, building proficiency naturally alongside conceptual understanding.

oneOnOne.title: One-on-One Learning Support
oneOnOne.description: Each student receives personalized, individualized attention through voice dialogues. The AI adapts to each learner's pace, understanding level, and needs, providing the kind of one-on-one support that's difficult to scale in large classrooms.

teacherInsights.title: Teacher Insights
teacherInsights.description: Actionable summaries help teachers identify which concepts are secure, where misconceptions persist, and which students need targeted support.

step1.title: Learn in Class
step1.description: Teachers introduce concepts in class as usual, then assign short oral homework using ConvoEd.

step2.title: One-on-One Practice at Home
step2.description: Each student engages in personalized voice dialogues with AI, explaining concepts, responding to questions, and receiving individualized feedback in their native language.

step3.title: Build Understanding
step3.description: Through guided practice, immediate feedback, and progressive English scaffolding, students build strong conceptual foundations.

step4.title: Support Teachers
step4.description: Teachers receive actionable insights about student understanding, enabling targeted support and better instruction.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Learning?
cta.description: Join the waitlist to be among the first to experience ConvoEd and help shape the future of multilingual education.
